Left 4 Dead is it worth buying in 2019? I think it is worth it because of how easy the game can be run almost on any modern day computer. But if you do have an expensive gaming computer its still good because I think this is like a classic just a good game to have in your library for 99 cents on sale.

Nice game. Combination between FPS and zombie chaos. Much zombie much fun

Hadn't played this since 2012 so I decided to revisit it.  I played on single player and for the most part the AI bots perform extremely well.  Even on normal mode it's a challenge but not overwhelming.  It's a great zombie shredding game and really just a great game overall.    The game engine is super smooth on my Nvidia 1050 Ti.  Zero lag throughout all the campaigns.  I actually think I liked it even more the second time around.  The only other zombie game that rivals it is Dead Island but that game is a slightly different animal.  Anyway I highly recommend this game and now I'm going to replay Left 4 Dead 2!
